messages.content: Given a sentence and the names of two people choose the relationship between the people from the following options: daughter, sister, son, aunt, father, husband, granddaughter, brother, nephew, mother, uncle, grandfather, wife, grandmother, niece, grandson, son-in-law, father-in-law, daughter-in-law, mother-in-law.  So Angela is Myrna's:
daughter
